text: My friends and I had a disappointing experience at this gym. The equipment was outdated and poorly maintained, making it uncomfortable to work out. The staff seemed disinterested and unhelpful. We expected a better fitness environment for the price we paid. We won't be returning.

You will feel motivated in this center! The trainers will pull you up when you feel that you are tired. They'll cheer you and remind you of the reason why you join them. I always enjoy every session here. I am happy that I was invited by my friend to be a part of SWEAT!

After more than 1 year, i still enjoy the small group training very much. The trainers are personable, experienced and motivate you. They wun let you stay in your comfort zone for long. Made lots of friends too.

This is the best personal training gym in Singapore.
If you are like me and you have always had gym memberships that you pay for but never use, here is your solution.
I've been going to Sweat for 2 months and have never done the same exercise twice.
I found it much easier to stay fit now that I am enjoying my workouts.

Friendly and comfortable place to train without feeling pressured. Just nice push to drive you harder on Fitness and Toning. Enjoy the circuit training and other sessions to build Cardio, Strength, Flexibility and Balance.ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š Sunil
